name: ChicagoBaseballFacts
0:
”Alexa, Open Chicago Baseball Facts”
”Alexa, Ask Chicago Baseball Facts to tell me a baseball fact”
”Alexa, Ask Chicago Baseball Facts to give me trivia”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: chicago baseball facts
des:
This is a skill that recites all sorts of facts about baseball that tie back to Chicago. Did you know that the area has had professional teams going back to the 19th century? Do you know what the original locations were that the game was played at? Do you know who the pioneers were when the sport was first started in Chicago? Use this skill to get quick facts, and learn more about the sport that Chicago loves!

This skill is not related to or supported by any professional baseball leagues or teams.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
